llm.feedback:
Up | 0–3 weeks | Policy easing bets rise as Jackson Hole signals and incoming data keep inflation contained, lifting risk appetite and pressuring real yields lower | Watch: Jackson Hole communications; CPI/payroll data; BoJ moves; China credit impulse; invalidation: a sustained hawkish tilt or hotter-than-expected inflation/wage prints shift policy expectations | 40–50% (GX057ADL7)(37UZC9X8I)(K0WFSW29E)(TXVQ5ZQ0N)
Up | 3–6 months | Regime tilt toward deeper easing as inflation remains manageable and growth stabilizes, with ~150–175bp of cuts priced and risk-on breadth expanding into capex/AI gear | Watch: data-dependent CPI/payroll momentum; 10-year yields near 4.2–4.25%; USDJPY around 146.5–146.6; BoJ normalization; China credit impulse; invalidation: data deteriorates or policy surprises escalate risk-off | 25–35% (GX057ADL7)(V7GV8YBQU)(Q7VVGNSQE)(C22MKA9VY)
Down | 0–3 weeks | Hawkish surprises or hotter inflation/wage prints could re-pricing risk premia and press risk assets lower, despite some easing bets | Watch: CPI/wage prints; Jackson Hole signaling; Fed/BoJ tone; cross-border funding risk from yen dynamics; invalidation: data confirm easing path or policy clarity that keeps yields stable | 15–25% (TXVQ5ZQ0N)(K0WFSW29E)(H9WSBYP3D)(GX057ADL7)
Down | 3–6 months | Geopolitical sanctions and energy supply constraints could tighten risk premia and yield a stronger dollar, limiting AI/tech capex upside | Watch: DRC sanctions chatter; oil balance signals; China credit impulse evolution; BoJ divergence; invalidation: sanctions or energy news abates or policy offset | 15–25% (TN66GHPAT)(J99EM2TPZ)(GX057ADL7)(K0WFSW29E)
